description: This CSS file contains styles for a minimalist todo application, managing light and dark theme colors, layout, and responsive design for the app's interface.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container class for the application, sets up background and text colors based on theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Defines styles for the header section of the application, including layout and background colors.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Style for the logo of the application with size and animation behavior.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Style for application links, specifying color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button styles for the theme toggle feature, including positioning, colors, and hover effects.
